short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Friendly introduces an extension to enhance your Twitch experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Twitch Friendly, the extension that will make your Twitch experience healthier than ever. In the face of the surge in adult-oriented content, we've decided to take matters into our own hands to provide you with a Twitch environment suitable for everyone.

Here's what we offer:

ğŸš« Community-Powered Blocking: Thanks to an online database continually enriched by the community, Twitch Friendly eliminates unwanted adult content, allowing you to enjoy Twitch without worrying about embarrassing surprises.

ğŸŒ We Rely on You: We're all in the same boat, and we rely on your participation! Report streamers who don't play by the rules so that we can keep our database at the highest standard. Your small contribution can make a big difference for everyone.

ğŸ“¡ A Feed for Everyone: Our ultimate goal? A clean Twitch feed, free from unwanted adult content. We want every user to enjoy Twitch without fearing stumbling upon something that doesn't suit them.
